arts.ttl: The lowdown on Lincoln City 0 Charlton Athletic 0 - Point apiece in blustery conditions
arts.sum: Former Addick Reeco Hackett had Lincolns’ best opening 20 minutes from time, with Allan Campbell wasting Charlton’s a few moments later. The first-half was evenly contested but Charlton made more of an attempt to get the ball down and play than they did in the midweek defeat to Crawley Town.

arts.ttl: Charlton Athletic boss Nathan Jones ‘proud’ of Addicks display as they battle elements during goalless draw at Lincoln City
arts.sum: We were brave, took the sting out of the game and had the best situations. The positives that came out were that it was a clean sheet, and we limited them to very little.

arts.ttl: Lincoln’s winless run extended to six games after draw with Charlton
